definition: whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
how about it?/what do you think?

sentences.english: How do you find an ‘Island of Misfit Foods’ near you?
sentences.chinese: 你是如何寻找周围的“非适当食品小岛”的呢？

sentences.english: Learn how to handle setbacks. Life is made of ups, downs, and disappointments.
sentences.chinese: 学会如何处理挫折，生活由顺利，挫折和失望构成。

sentences.english: Americans continue to debate how to interpret the Second Amendment.
sentences.chinese: 美国人为如何解释第二修正案继续辩论。

sentences.english: The critical question is one of scale and degree, " said Nutt, the chairman of the government's Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs.
sentences.chinese: 关键问题是如何掌握好它的度和量。

sentences.english: How is your life, situation, etc?
sentences.chinese: 你的生活，情况等等如何？

sentences.english: I'm studying how to play with a yo-yo.
sentences.chinese: 我正在学习如何玩溜溜球。

sentences.english: How to use fondaparinux in those patients?
sentences.chinese: 这些患者应该如何使用磺达肝癸钠？

sentences.english: But what about the "War on Immigration"?
sentences.chinese: 那么“移民战争”又如何呢？

sentences.english: The question is whether the dedicated have had more influence than the image- flashers .
sentences.chinese: 问题是无论如何对阅读的这种关注比图片根由影响。

sentences.english: Learn how Montessori teaches mathematics in this free video clip.
sentences.chinese: 了解如何在这个自由蒙台梭利教数学的视频剪辑。

sentences.english: How could we establish multi-lingual communication models in different contexts?
sentences.chinese: 如何建立不同情境下多语言沟通模式？

sentences.english: The most commonly asked question concerning cellulite is how to get rid of it.
sentences.chinese: 关于瘦身，人们最常问到的问题就是如何消除脂肪。

sentences.english: How to defense collusive attack is the key problems for the designing of fingerprinting.
sentences.chinese: 所以设计指纹算法的关键问题是如何防范合谋攻击。

sentences.english: He reminded me how careful I ought to be in doing it.
sentences.chinese: 他提醒我在做这事的时候应如何小心。

sentences.english: He could see how his suffering was all the mercy of the Lord coming in disguise.
sentences.chinese: 他能明白他的受苦如何都是伪装而来的主的仁慈。

sentences.english: How do you cope when your brain locks up?
sentences.chinese: 当脑子突然抽住的时候，你会如何解决呢？

definition: particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
whether or not/can it or can't it/is it possible?
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
to go to the bottom of a matter/after all/when all is said and done/(in an interrogative sentence) finally/outcome/result
finally/in the end/when all is said and done/after all/to the end/to the last
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
how much?/how many?/(phone number, student ID etc) what number?
